articles.title: Asia stocks fall as rate uncertainty, Iran tensions weigh; S.Korea outperforms - Investing.com
articles.description: Asia stocks fall as rate uncertainty, Iran tensions weigh; S.Korea outperforms
articles.content:
Investing.com-- Most Asian stocks fell on Friday as growing uncertainty over U.S. interest rates and heightened geopolitical tensions in Iran saw traders steer clear of risk-driven assets.
